review.reviewBody: Consistently fantastic and the Italian Rosemary Lemon Garlic Chiken is no exception. Perfectly cooked with a great flavour profile and the bonus is the 1/2 order of pasta which is a fantastic meal in itself.
Bacon wrapped scallops are not worth the price and actually suboptimal. Very thin and overcooked 8 scallop pieces are not worth $20.
WE LOVED THE ALFREDO someone couldnt held back themselves from eating it so they can have lunch tomorrow
The pasta was one of the best I had in a long time. Definitely reccomend.

Key  word here - Consistency! 

Great value, real Italian  cuisine . 

 Ordered  2. Bolognese spaghetti 

Gnocchi Cardinale..  

Both large portions and tasted  just as I had hoped.  

Thank you !
